name: haex-e2e-tests
description: End-to-end tests for haex-vault, haex-pass, and browser extension

scripts.docker:build:release: source scripts/resolve-versions.sh release && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:build:nightly: source scripts/resolve-versions.sh nightly && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:test: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec vault-a pnpm test
scripts.docker:test:dual-vault: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec vault-a pnpm test:dual-vault
scripts.docker:test:release: source scripts/resolve-versions.sh release && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec vault-a pnpm test
scripts.docker:shell: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec vault-a bash
scripts.docker:shell:b: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec vault-b bash
